Hi, my name is

Rabindra Joshi

I build things for the web.

I’m a Software Engineer based in Kathmandu, Nepal. I’ve an obsession with building exceptional, high quality, well-architectured, web-based solutions. My goal is to collaborate with other world-class engineers to build products that deliver performant experience.

Tools of the Trade

Languages

JavaScript is my native language, I also speak TypeScript. I can communicate fluently in Python, if required. Sometimes, I bash out as well.

I speak

Bash, JavaScript ES2021, TypeScript, (S)CSS, Python, SQL

Also tried

PHP

Libraries & Frameworks

I survive around JavaScript ecosystem, Node and React being the primary tools. I enjoy JAMstack well.

Everyday Tools

Node, Express, React, Redux, Postgres, Redis

Worked With

11ty Django Jekyll Flask Angular Laravel

Tools & Platforms

I develop on Docker and test APIs with Postman while utilizing GitHub Actions for some automation. I've used AWS at work, personal sites hosted on DO droplets for predictable billing.

I use

Git, Docker, Postman, Github Actions, Firebase, Digital Ocean, Heroku, Nginx, Jira

Experienced with

AWS Netlify Gulp Parcel Figma WordPress
